|brand = Actiontec |model = GT704WG |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 09/27/2011 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Actiontec_GT704WG |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router,dsl modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = LNQGT704 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = LNQDL00BGT704 |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;TNETD7300;TNETD7300GDU, 62AD4RW; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 4KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 150 <!-- 150 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320ABTC-90; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = ICSI;IC42S16800-7T; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6060; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0F:B3 |oui = 00:0F:B3
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = ADAM2;0.22.02;; |stockos = Linux;2.4.17;MontaVista;mvl21-malta-mips fp le;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.6 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 6-pin header,, populated,, (38400 8N1),, |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL2+,schematics |addchip = Serial EEPROM (8 Kbit);Atmel;AT24C08AN;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = XXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^[A-Z0-9]{5}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/15/2004 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Texas Instruments;TNETW1130;TNETW1130GVF, 5CP8848, DC; |rad1chip2 = Radia;RC2422B; |rad1chip3 = Radia;RC2326; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The SSID follows a pattern of 5 letters and numbers (example: EJB67). :Per the label, the WEP key appears to be last 5 octets of the unit :MAC address (which may be the WLAN MAC minus 3 hex digits).
The included power supply is a '''Actiontec''' AD-1260 (12V DC, 0.6A). :ID/OD/Len measurements are not exact.
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.actiontec.com/products/manuals/GT704-WG_NCS_User_Manual_3.0.1.0.6.0s.pdf User manual] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/actiontec/gt704wg ''Actiontec GT704WG'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/actiontec/actiontec_gt704wg_1a |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/actiontec/gt704wg |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 8.09 |current_supported_version = 10.03.1 |unsupportedfuncntions = Will boot but there is insufficient memory to function. |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
